backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing product catalog, shopping cart, and order management with in-memory storage using Maps and Lists.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (3D homepage, product catalog, cart, checkout) to source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and styling for the digital marketing shop.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, products, product detail, checkout, and order confirmation pages.
Button component for adding products to cart with loading, success states, and toast notifications using Zustand store.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-out sheet component displaying cart items with scrollable list, total calculation, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/components/CartItem.tsx: Cart item row component with product display, quantity controls (increment/decrement), and remove button.
frontend/src/components/CartSummary.tsx: Card component displaying order pricing breakdown including subtotal, optional tax and shipping, and total with gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutForm.tsx: React form component using react-hook-form for collecting shipping information (name, email, address fields) with validation. Accepts onSubmit callback and isSubmitting prop to handle form submission state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying company branding, product/company links, social media icons, and copyright notice with caffeine.ai attribution. Uses current year and hostname for dynamic content.
frontend/src/components/Hero3D.tsx: Full-screen hero section with 3D scene background, gradient overlays, and CTA buttons. Features animated heading with gradient text and navigation to products page.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps all pages with Navigation header, main content outlet, and Footer. Provides consistent page structure across the application.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky navigation header with logo, links to home/products, shopping cart button with item count badge, and mobile menu drawer. Integrates with cart store and CartDrawer component.
frontend/src/components/OrderSummary.tsx: Card component displaying cart items with quantities, prices, subtotal, shipping (free), and total. Uses cart store and includes scrollable area for item list.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Card component for displaying individual product with image, name, category badge, description, price, and add-to-cart button. Includes hover effects and navigation to product detail page.
frontend/src/components/ProductFilters.t: Filter panel component with category dropdown and price range slider. Accepts current filter values and callbacks for updating category and price range selections.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Grid layout component for displaying product cards with loading skeletons and empty state. Renders products in responsive 1-3 column grid based on screen size.
frontend/src/components/ProductSearch.ts: Search input component with debounced search functionality (300ms delay). Triggers onSearch callback with search term after user stops typing.
frontend/src/components/Scene3D.tsx: Renders a 3D scene using React Three Fiber with floating geometric shapes (sphere, box, torus, octahedron) that have metallic materials, distortion effects, and auto-rotating orbit controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state, automatically invalidating and refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching products, individual product details, and handling checkout mutations with automatic cart invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color variables for deep teal, warm gold, and charcoal gray themes, plus light/dark mode support and custom shadow utilities.
frontend/src/lib/cartStore.ts: Zustand store for shopping cart state management with persistence, handling add/remove/update operations and total price calculation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page component that displays order summary and checkout form, handles order submission via backend actor, and redirects to confirmation on success.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page featuring a 3D hero section, three feature cards highlighting business benefits, and a featured products section with navigation to the full product catalog.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmation.tsx: Order confirmation page that displays order details (ID, date, status) with a success message and navigation buttons to continue shopping or return home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Product detail page showing individual product information with image, description, price, category badge, quantity selector, and add-to-cart functionality with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/Products.tsx: Product catalog page with search, category filtering, price range filtering, and a grid display of products using ProductGrid, ProductFilters, and ProductSearch components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palettes (deepTeal, warmGold, charcoalGray), container settings, border radius variables, and extended theme utilities with OKLCH color format.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing implemented features (3D homepage, product catalog, shopping cart, checkout flow) and pending feature requests for an ultra-realistic 3D digital marketing e-commerce website.
